thumb.title: [AC][exA-Arcadia]『アクウギャレット EXA LABEL』 AIRGALLET EXA LABEL for Arcades Attract Video
thumb.description: アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用縦スクロールシューティング『アクウギャレット EXAレーベル』2025年4月稼働予定Players: 1-2 Genre: Shooter Monitor: Vertical (Recommended), Horizontal Languages: English, JapaneseNEW VOICES Every character and story sequence is now fully voiced by renowned ’90’s anime voice actors! CAST KEIICHIRO TOJO – MASAMI KIKUCHI(菊池正美)JOHNNY GLOVER – TETSUYA IWANAGA(岩永哲哉) COMMANDER – URARA TAKANO(高乃麗) & more詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/3RxZhGlCopyright Information DEVELOPED & PUBLISHED BY ©2025 EXA-ARCADIA ORIGINAL GAME BY GAZELLE ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
